strings:
Function to translate English text to French and apply augmentation on the image using Kornia

    Arguments:
    english_text : str -- English text that needs to be translated to French
    augmented_image -- PIL Image which needs to be augmented

    Returns:
    translated[0]['translation_text'] -- Translated French text
    transformed_image_np -- Augmented numpy image
English to French Translation and Image Augmentation
Provide English text to get its French translation. And upload image for augmentation
Text to translate from English to French...
